title: Volna 1
description: Site on the Kerch Strait inhabited from the 6th century BCE-4th century CE, and resettled in the 8th-9th, 12-13th, and 17th-18th centuries CE. Rescue excavations were conducted on the site from 1996-2012.

properties.description: Point representing the approximate centerpoint of the Volna 1 site, after Abramson 2020.
properties.title: Approximate imagery location of Volna 1 site
